about_the_game:
“Chronicles” are packs of themed levels with a self-contained story told throughout, and are unlocked after completing the first 6 levels of the main campaign.
In the midst of an expedition, a nomad community is led to a safe haven by a comet. The town considers its presence a good omen and celebrates every time it visits throughout the generations. However, one fateful day, the comet doesn’t appear, leaving them to helplessly try to stay together despite the absence of what once bound them.

“Wandering Stars” is the sixth DLC for Outlanders, in which we witness the rise and fall of a city and the lives of those who once were a part of it. Prepare for a region wide identity crisis surrounded by aegean-like landscapes and architecture.
